actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 313 of the National Housing Act to provide authority for emergency home purchase assistance at lower interest rates.

summary.text: Emergency Mortgage Credit Act - Amends the National Housing Act to permit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to exercise interim mortgage purchasing authority to promote homeownership opportunities for low-and moderate-income families. Allows the Government National Mortgage Association (GNMA) to purchase and sell any qualified mortgage which has an outstanding principal balance not in excess of 90 percent of the value of the property securing the mortgage. Removes the interest limitation on such mortgages. Prevents the purchasing of mortgages where the mortgagor's income exceeds a specified level. Place a ceiling on the amount of GNMA purchases and commitments.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 313 of the National Housing Act to provide authority for emergency home purchase assistance at lower interest rates.
